thread.title: BRIEF-India Cenbank Imposes Monetary Penalty Of 4 Mln Rupees On State Bank Of India

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India Cenbank Imposes Monetary Penalty Of 4 Mln Rupees On State Bank Of India

organizations.name: brief-india cenbank imposes monetary penalty of 4 mln rupees on state bank of india

text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Reserve Bank Of India:
* IMPOSES MONETARY PENALTY ON STATE BANK OF INDIA * IMPOSED MONETARY PENALTY ON SBI FOR NON-COMPLIANCE WITH DIRECTIONS ISSUED BY RBI ON DETECTION AND IMPOUNDING OF COUNTERFEIT NOTES
* IMPOSED A MONETARY PENALTY OF 4 MILLION RUPEES ON SBI ON MARCH 1 Source text: bit.ly/2G1p6Js Further company coverage:
